::Switchblade/Drag Strip/Dead-End/Astroblast::
Switchblade continues to work on Megatron's head, "Woohh, this 
is a tricky one, but I think that I've almost got it." He fiddles with 
the chip and some wires and the chip comes out. "Finally, damn 
chip took a while. Quite well guarded against intruders such as 
myself!" He puts together all of Megatron's head returning it to its 
original form. He hands Megatron the chip.

Drag Strip, Astroblast, and Dead-End notice a new bot approaching 
and move to protect Megatron. Astroblast warns the new bot, "Halt, 
or you will be terminated, just look around," he indicates the 
Terrorcons, the Bodicons and several other bots present. "Who are 
you, and what faction do you follow." 

Switchblade now notices the bot, and he hops off of Megatron, 
having finished fixing him. He walks over and looks at the bot 
calmly, "FireBlade, fancy seeing you here, almost as immpossible 
as me ever being taller than you," Switchblade is dwarfed by 
FireBlade's huge size. "Astroblast and Co., you guys can back off, 
this guy was, and I guess still is, my protector. I got knocked out 
by some damn EMP cannons and left him, not of my own accord, 
back on Cybertron.

On 24 Mar 2001, at 1:26, whyteboy08@... wrote:

> ::FireBlade::
> FireBlade could see the forms of bots outside of the base...He 
> stopped and scanned them all....As he looked them over one by one 
> from the distance he saw a familiar figure..."Could it be??" HE 
> stated walking again, faster, then faster still.."IT IS!!!"
> He picked up his pace even more and walked straight towards his olkd 
> teamate SwitchBlade.
>
